itemDescription: 3rd President of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints

wikipedia_page.main: John Taylor (1 November 1808 – 25 July 1887) was an English-born religious leader who served as the third president of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (LDS Church) from 1880 to 1887. He is the first and so far only president of the LDS Church to have been born outside the United States.
